content:
As I watch the tiny world bubble slowly float up,
I'm... actually feeling a bit moved.
info: 月下小聚后闲聊-莎莎_莎莎任务闲聊

content:
Every day brings new things to look forward to,
New goals to achieve,
And new friends to meet!
info: 月下小聚后闲聊-莎莎_莎莎任务闲聊

content:
So Mors is really coming to play around in our Astralink...
Oh wait, I mean to raise pets with us?
info: 月下小聚后闲聊-莎莎_莎莎任务闲聊

content:
So, do we need to collect them from many places?
Well, when should we head out?
info: 月下小聚后闲聊-莎莎_莎莎任务闲聊

content: Me? I'm not sleepy! I'm gonna stay here and have a staring contest with the little world!\nLet's see who blinks first!
info: 月下小聚后闲聊-莎莎_莎莎任务闲聊

content:
Who puts that kind of thing in tea?!
<size=30>Although... it's actually quite tasty...</size>
info: 月下小聚后闲聊-莎莎_莎莎任务闲聊

content: Before, the thing that made me happiest was packing up my bags and preparing for the next day's journey with my Master to explore the unknown!
info: 月下小聚后闲聊-莎莎_莎莎任务闲聊

content: But this new life on the Astralink with everyone...\nseems pretty nice too!
info: 月下小聚后闲聊-莎莎_莎莎任务闲聊

content:
But come to think of it, if we really flew up into the sky...
Wouldn't that be...
Even more wild!
info: 月下小聚后闲聊-莎莎_莎莎任务闲聊

content:
Alright! Next time we set out,
Our goal is to reach the heavens,
And find some tiny worlds to play in!
info: 月下小聚后闲聊-莎莎_莎莎任务闲聊

content:
Phew, that was way too close!
We almost got taken for a ride by Mors.
Good thing my "Pink Bubble Bomber" caught you guys just in time.

if you're tired,
you should go rest in the RV.
